title: IWL 2023 Final, Kickstart FC vs Gokulam Kerala as it happened: GKFC win Indian Women‚Äôs League title
content:
That‚Äôs it from us tonight! Gokulam Kerala FC have completed the three-peat in some style. A dominant 5-0 win over Kickstart FC in the final to underline their status as the best women‚Äôs team in the country by a mile.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #IWL2023 #IWLFinalGOKULAM KERALA WOMEN‚ÄôS FC: CHAMPIONS OF INDIAN FOOTBALLhttps://t.co/yfjYXFbAwy pic.twitter.com/AoBC9PCzcx‚Äî The Field (@thefield_in) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    IWL season awardsBest emerging player: Astam Oraon (KSFC)Golden Glove: Linthoi Devi (KSFC)Golden Boot: Sabitra Bhandari (GKFC)Golden Ball: Indumathi Kathiresan (GKFC)
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    We did it! GKFC crowned champions of the IWL for the third time in a row! üèÜ‚ú® A hat-trick of victories that solidifies our legacy. #GKFC #Malabarians #IWL #defendingchampionsüèÜ pic.twitter.com/pQvv8hyBZZ‚Äî Gokulam Kerala FC (@GokulamKeralaFC) May 21, 2023



    Gokulam Kerala in the IWL over the past few years. Simply sensational.‚Äî Anirudh (@AnirudhMenon89) May 21, 2023



    Indumathi, @SandhiyaR_7 and Sowmiya's second #IWL title. Congratulations, champs üëèüèæ‚Äî Jeni (@JenishaRani) May 21, 2023



    ‚ú® CHAMPIONS üèÜüèÜüèÜ@GokulamKeralaFC have won the Hero IWL for a third consecutive time üôåKFCK 0‚É£-5Ô∏è‚É£ GKFCüì∫ https://t.co/zwhm3gpe1r#KFCKGKFC ‚öîÔ∏è #HeroIWL üèÜ #ShePower üëß #IndianFootball ‚öΩ pic.twitter.com/LodoLxMzha‚Äî Indian Football Team (@IndianFootball) May 21, 2023



    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    FT: Gokulam Kerala are the Indian Women‚Äôs League champions! What an absolutely dominant performance from the Malabarians to complete a hat-trick of IWL titles. Kickstart FC barely got a sniff in the match as GKFC blew them away. Sabitra Bhandari, the Golden Boot winner and quite possibly the Player of the Season, led GKFC from the front with her 29th goal of the season and two further assists. KSFC captain Dalima Chhibber would be eager to forget tonight. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    around 300ish is the turnout in the final, after a rough count of heads #IWL pic.twitter.com/xgOFL7vtDb‚Äî Radhaüß£ (@radhalathgupta) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    89‚Äô KSFC 0-5 GKFC: Sabitra Bhandari, scorer of 29 goals and the all-time top-scorer in the league‚Äôs history, still has the energy and hunger to add another goal to her tally. What an athlete! Five minutes added on.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    81‚Äô KSFC 0-5 GKFC: Roja Devi gets in on the action! Sabitra Bhandari once again involved as she cuts the ball back behind the KSFC defence and Roja Devi flies in to tap the ball in. Brilliant from Gokulam.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    80‚Äô KSFC 0-4 GKFC: 10 minutes until Gokulam Kerala are crowned champions of Indian football and the party has already begun in the stands. Drums and hooters going off now. Here‚Äôs hoping next season, with home and away format introduced, fans turn up in more numbers.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    72‚Äô KSFC 0-4 GKFC: Saru Limbu tries her luck from distance but Beatrice is able to make a comfortable diving save.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    70‚Äô KSFC 0-4 GKFC: Gokulam are not taking their foot of the gas despite being four goals to the good. KSFC are trying to get things done but the Gokulam defence has largely been untroubled.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Jyoti Chauhan does the unthinkable üî•She becomes the first ever Indian footballer to score a hattrick in an European top division league by scoring 3 goals against ≈ΩNK Agram in ≈ΩNK Dinamo Zagreb's final league game in Croatian Women's League of 2022-23 season.#IndianFootball pic.twitter.com/7YYD85TDRe‚Äî Indian Football Fan (@FootbalIndiaFan) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    65‚Äô KSFC 0-4 GKFC: Ranjana Chanu with some really good footwork and use of upper body strength to force her way into the box from the left. She squares it to Sabitra whose first time shot is deflected behind for a corner. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #IWL2023 #IWLFinalSabitra did not need to do this to Dalimaüò≠üò≠üò≠https://t.co/1FurkvlQl7 pic.twitter.com/KDsc0v90wI‚Äî Dilip Unnikrishnan (@DilipUnnikrishn) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    58‚Äô KSFC 0-4 GKFC: Uffff! Sabitra leaves Dalima in the dust as she storms into the box from the left. She unleashes a fierce shot aiming for the top corner but Maibam Linthoingambi Devi makes the save.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #IWL2023 #IWLFinalSabitra and Sandhiya combine really well to make it 4-0 for Gokulam Keralahttps://t.co/yfjYXFbAwy pic.twitter.com/p6aYyVxhtQ‚Äî The Field (@thefield_in) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    52‚Äô KSFC 0-4 GKFC: Sandhiya nets again! GKFC have turned on the style now. Sabitra does really well on the left to get past her defender and float an inviting cross. Sandhiya is completely unmarked in the middle and gets the easiest of headers. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    #IWL2023 #IWLFinalWangkhem Linthoingambi Devi with a pile driver from distance and Beatrice tips it just over the barhttps://t.co/1FurkvlQl7 pic.twitter.com/QDENh00Q0H‚Äî Dilip Unnikrishnan (@DilipUnnikrishn) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    47‚Äô KSFC 0-3 GKFC: Bright start from Kickstart in the second half. First Sara Limbu manages to force her way into the box but with three defenders in Maroon ganging up on her, she scuffs her shot straight at Beatrice. Moments later, Lepcha cannot control a cross from the right and it runs away. Then, Wangkhem Linthoingambi Devi hammers in a long-range effort and Beatrice has to come up with a really good save to tip the ball over the bar. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    46‚Äô KSFC 0-3 GKFC: We‚Äôre back for the second half of the IWL final. Gokulam Kerala have been absolutely dominant so far and it will take one hell of a comeback for Kickstart FC to win the title. Sushmita Lepcha comes on for Babita Devi for KSFC.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    That turn and that finish by Sandhiyaü§åüèæ #IWL pic.twitter.com/TUWGvFSZ8N‚Äî Jeni (@JenishaRani) May 21, 2023



    #IWL2023 #IWLFinalHigh-fives from Anthony Andrews for his players at half-time. Gokulam Kerala well on their way to a hat-trick of IWL titleshttps://t.co/1FurkvlQl7 pic.twitter.com/KU2LBFg40m‚Äî Dilip Unnikrishnan (@DilipUnnikrishn) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    HT, KSFC 0-3 GKFC: Gokulam Kerala FC are well on their way to a third successive Indian Women‚Äôs League title. Absolutely blown Kickstart out of the water. Langam Chaoba Devi needs to give a half-time team talk for the ages to get her side back in this final.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    44‚Äô KSFC 0-3 GKFC: Sabitra nearly makes it 4! Forces her way through the KSFC defence with ease and goes for the far-post but the ball rolls agonisingly past the upright. At the other end, Elizabeth goes down clutching her back after a strong challenge from Ashalata Devi. Three minutes added on.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Dalima concedes a penalty with a handball. Indu steps up and drives low to Linthoi's right. The keeper goes the right way but the shot is too well placed for her to reach. 3-0 to @GokulamKeralaFC. Football is too easy for this team.‚Äî Women's Football India (@WomensFootieIND) May 21, 2023



    #IWL2023 #IWLFinalPoor defending from Dalima. Had all the time in the world to control the high ball but lets it bounce allowing Sabitra to muscle the ball away from her. Then goes in for the tackle with her hand raised to concede the penaltyhttps://t.co/1FurkvlQl7 pic.twitter.com/KX6KKlK8Gk‚Äî Dilip Unnikrishnan (@DilipUnnikrishn) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    36‚Äô KSFC 0-3 GKFC: Penalty for GKFC and Indumathi makes no mistake from the spot! KSFC have a mountain to climb now.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    30‚Äô KSFC 0-2 GKFC: A first attempt on goal for KSFC. Kaviya lets one fly from outside the box. Beatrice Nketia scampers to her left but the ball rolls just past the upright.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Sandhiya with the precision finish! GKFC extends the lead to 2-0 against Kickstart FC‚úåÔ∏è#GKFC #Malabarians #IWL #defendingchampionsüèÜ pic.twitter.com/Tta9JchaTW‚Äî Gokulam Kerala FC (@GokulamKeralaFC) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    26‚Äô KSFC 0-2 GKFC: Nearly a third for GKFC! Delightful cross from deep by Shilky Devi and Sabitra Bhandari rises highest but cannot direct her header at goal. KSFC escape and we‚Äôll have the cooling break.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Sandhiya with the precision finish! GKFC extends the lead to 2-0 against Kickstart FC‚úåÔ∏è#GKFC #Malabarians #IWL #defendingchampionsüèÜ pic.twitter.com/Tta9JchaTW‚Äî Gokulam Kerala FC (@GokulamKeralaFC) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    22‚Äô KSFC 0-2 GKFC: Sandhiya doubles GKFC‚Äôs lead! She outmuscles Papki Devi to the ball to get inside the box. Fakes cutting in to send Wangkhem Linthoingambi Devi the wrong way before arrowing her shot past Maibam Linthoingambi Devi. The KSFC keeper was furious with her defence but she should have saved that shot anyway.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    15‚Äô KSFC 0-1 GKFC: Elizabeth finds herself with some decent space on the left and drifts inside. Step over after step over but Kritina Devi times her tackle to perfection to win the ball. 
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    15‚Äô KSFC 0-1 GKFC: Elizabeth, with her back to goal, plays a delightful through ball onto Babina Devi. The KSFC midfielder just about gets to the ball but puts her cross behind.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    She had no right to hit the target from there with that much power, let alone pick out the perfect üéØ at the far top corner.‚Äî Anirudh (@AnirudhMenon89) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    10‚Äô, KSFC 0-1 GKFC: It is one-way traffic right now. That goal has shocked KSFC a bit and GKFC are imposing themselves. A bit of concern for the two-time champions as Ranjana Chanu goes down from a heavy challenge. She limps but eventually runs it off.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    5‚Äô, KSFC 0-1 GKFC: WHAT A GOAL FROM SABITRA! The Nepalese striker gets on the end of a through ball down the right and she lets one fly from the edge of the box. Maibam Linthoingambi Devi can only watch as the ball flies past her into the top corner. Sabitra has now become the all-time top goalscorer in IWL history.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    no way is there a paraat and balan at TransStadia but no digital scoreboard #IWL pic.twitter.com/WgF8NmA3Dx‚Äî Radhaüß£ (@radhalathgupta) May 21, 2023



        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    KSFC vs GKFC: Gokulam Kerala, clad in their traditional maroon kits, get us underway at the TransStadia in Ahmedabad.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    Here‚Äôs how Gokulam Kerala FC line up

    Here‚Äôs how Kickstart FC line up

        
    
    
       
       
       
    
    
    
    
    Hello and welcome to Scroll‚Äôs coverage of Indian football as Kickstart FC Karnataka take on Gokulam Kerala FC in the final of the Indian Women‚Äôs League 2023.After 62 matches over 26 days, it all comes down to this. Kickstart FC Karnataka try and prevent Gokulam Kerala FC from completing a hat-trick of IWL titles. The Karnataka side start as underdogs against the giants of Indian women‚Äôs football. It will be a clash between the best attack in the league and the best defence. Gokulam, led by Nepal‚Äôs Sabitra Bhandari, have scored a whopping 58 goals. Bhandari is the top scorer and has nearly scored as many goals by herself, 28, as Kickstart have scored as a team, 32.However, the Dalima Chhibber-led side have been clinical too, losing just once in the season and beating the likes of Odisha FC and former champions Sethu Madurai FC on their way to the final.Stay tuned for updates.
    
        
        
            
            
            
        
    

    ùóßùó¢ùóóùóîùó¨ is the ùóóùóîùó¨ ü§©The 2022-23 #HeroIWL Final üèÜWatch LIVE on theüì∫#IndianFootball YouTube Channel #ShePower üëß pic.twitter.com/2Jfk1PyzrL‚Äî Indian Football Team (@IndianFootball) May 21, 2023



    The wait is over! ‚ö°#GKFC #Malabarians #IWL #defendingchampionsüèÜ pic.twitter.com/fjj9rLOwn1‚Äî Gokulam Kerala FC (@GokulamKeralaFC) May 21, 2023
